entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 3:31 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Risk of hail early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 through mainland inlets and valleys. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late in the evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
